main event: A white, round object was observed in the night sky, appearing as large as a first magnitude star.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 30 minutes,The object was determined to be Satellite Echo I,The observation was made by a crew of 10 including 6 officers and 4 crew members,The object was visible to the unaided eye, binoculars, and a sextant,The object's trajectory was reported to be at a speed of 7 degrees per minute.
sighted object: white round object resembling a first magnitude star
